price: On je po Zemlji nepomična brda postavio da vas ona ne potresa, a i rijeke i puteve da se ispravno usmjeravate,
arabic: وَأَلۡقَىٰ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ رَوَٰسِيَ أَن تَمِيدَ بِكُمۡ وَأَنۡهَٰرٗا وَسُبُلٗا لَّعَلَّكُمۡ تَهۡتَدُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-alqā fī al-arḍi rawāsiya an tamīda bikum wa-anhāran wasubulan laʿallakum tahtadūna
